content:
I am not able to provide real-time updates or predict the future, and i do not have access to information that is not publicly available. however, in september 2020, it was announced that studio ghibli co-founder, isao takahata's unfinished film, the tale of the princess kaguya, is set to be completed and released. the film reportedly has about 12% of its animation incomplete, and studio ghibli is reportedly working on the final touches. 

aside from that, there have been no official announcements from studio ghibli regarding any upcoming projects. however, studio ghibli is known for its attention to detail and quality over quantity, so it may take several years before we see another film from the studio. nonetheless, studio ghibli's previous films continue to captivate new audiences and enchant longtime fans, so we can look forward to revisiting these timeless classics in the future.
